Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Fill the bathroom sink with water.', '2. Add soap to the water and mix gently to create a soapy
 solution.']

behavior fill_bathroom_sink_with_water(sink:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(sink) # Fill the sink with water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and is_bathroom(sink)
        # Select a sink in the bathroom
        fill_bathroom_sink_with_water(sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Fill the sink with water.', '2. Add soap to the water in the sink.']

def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determines whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior fill_sink_with_water(sink:item):
    body:
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # Turn on the faucet to fill the sink with water
            achieve has_water(sink)
            # Verify sink has water
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn off the faucet after filling

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and not has_water(sink)
        fill_sink_with_water(sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Find the sink in the bathroom.', '2. Run water into the sink.', '3. Add soap to the water in th
e sink.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        foreach sink: item:
            if is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, bathroom) and not visited(sink):
                observe(sink, "Check if it is the bathroom sink")

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Identify the sink in the bathroom.', '2. Fill the sink with water.', '3. Add soap to the water 
and mix to create soapy water.']

behavior identify_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        observe(sink, "Identify if it is a sink")
        achieve visited(sink)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        foreach sink: item:
            if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                identify_sink(sink)
